body: My computer is running slow so I'm thinking of upgrading it's parts, I was just wondering in your guys opinions what kind of graphics card I should get. I'm looking for one within the price range of $100, so nothing higher than $100. Currently my graphics card is really bad, my computer only has a dual core processor and it has a  ATI X1300 Pro graphics card(which is really bad). My computer is a Dell® vostro 200 from 2007. My computer is really crappy and I'm thinking of just upgrading it's parts then buying a new one. I have considered buying graphic cards from AMD because they are meant for gaming but I can't find any that fit in my price range. I looked at the AMD RaedonHD7770 but it costed $150. So yeah I was just wondering what in your mind is the best graphic card which is in the price range of $100.

title: What graphics card do you reccomend I get?

replies.body:
GTX 750.

But I would recommend just building a whole new computer.
replies.body_tagged:
GTX 750.

But I would recommend just building a whole new computer.

replies.body: I have the GTX 770 Its the BEST honest to god I swear it is.
replies.body_tagged: I have the GTX 770 Its the BEST honest to god I swear it is.

replies.body: Son, you don't need a GTX 750 to play Minecraft... 0-0
replies.body_tagged: Son, you don't need a GTX 750 to play Minecraft... 0-0

replies.body: if you want to be good at pvp then you do walrus.

replies.body: You don't need anymore than 60 FPS with max settings (like I get with my GT 640) .-.
